website_summaries.verdict: Buyers wanting a remarkably loud self-defense alarm will be impressed by this 140 decimal key chain system.
pros: Extremely loud sound for immediate attention
Alarm can be heard up to 330' away
cons: A few owners had issues with the pin randomly falling out, causing the alarm to sound

customer_reviews.title: It took care of two large dogs
customer_reviews.text: a surprise use for it, my niece was walking her little dog when two large dogs started running towards them, she was getting ready to have to start kicking at the dogs when she remembered the alarm, took it out and pulled the alarm and the two dogs stopped turned and high tailed it away from them, also several neighbors came out to see what was wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: vivian akins

customer_reviews.title: It will probably only work once
customer_reviews.text: It didn't even last a week. I tested the device when I first opened the package it worked great. Tried it again about a week later because my friend was interested in getting one and wanted to try it out and the device was basically dead. All you can hear is a faint sound coming out of it. Glad I didn't find this out during an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Uses
customer_reviews.text: After thinking this was perfect for my girls, the reality didn't match. It worked when we tested it but yesterday my girl had an urgent need to use it and it failed. I'm very disappointed but happy the situation was resolved peacefully.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough to wake the dead
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Scared my cat out of her fur when I tested them...lol. Giving one to my Mom when I go visit her.It won't prevent an attack, but it will draw attention to you in an emergency. Looks like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Nadine B.

customer_reviews.title: The pin is easy to pull
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my safety, and am really impressed. The pin is easy to pull,out and push back in to reset. The siren is incredibly loud. I feel safer just having it attached to my keychain. It also has a small flashlight to use when I am struggling to get my key in the lock.It has a chain to attach it to my keys, and a strap to put on my wrist when I am travelling from my car to my apartment or the mall.I feel safer just having this with me.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Egan

customer_reviews.title: Alarm no longer working after a few days
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter in college. The alarm no longer works after a few days very disappointing. The flash light works but not the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: LNicole

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I am a pet sitter and work alone. I’m always entering homes of people who are away. I walk dogs all day and night by myself in addition to walking my own dogs. This alarm gives me an added layer of self defense and protection. I wear it every day. The alarm is unbelievably loud and would definitely scare someone away or get people’s attention if you need help. Colors are very nice. Price is great! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Halo's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Safety at your fingertips
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for all of my female relatives this Christmas. Hope they never have to use it, but if the need arises, they can protect themselves and scare the attacker away. I tried out the alarm and it is loud.
customer_reviews.author: Double M

customer_reviews.title: We are glad we purchased them
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness, I have not had to use it and really don't want to. However, I was sitting on the sofa and had it in my pocket and I guess I moved around enough to disengage the pin. At first my husband & I were startled and then began to laugh. Saying, Damn this thing is loud ! We are glad we purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT shut off
customer_reviews.text: The unit fell on the floor by accident, then all I heard was a horrible piercing noize! We couldn't shut it off! I had to cup it in my hands unscrew the unit so I could remove the batteries. I come to find out there was no way to turn on OR off the unit! The button does nothing. The "Pin-Keychain" was still in the unit while all this was happening! Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Notions N Potions

customer_reviews.title: One of the two did not work. Test purchase. will buy more if problem is resolved.
customer_reviews.text: Product is what I want but can not tolerate 50% failure rate. In fact must expect zero failures.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Quazi Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of these as gifts... and they were appreciated by all. Especially those ladies that enjoy taking walks or sometimes feel uncomfortable walking through a parking lot and such. Just like a car alarm, I don't think help comes running when it gets set off but it is so uncomfortably loud that a perpetrator is very likely to run away when this little device is activated. Received very quickly and all 10 that I purchased seem to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Steve

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and one of them did not work (does not beep at all) the product is described as 2 working items not just 1. Lies!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Keep it in your hand
customer_reviews.text: Pin can fall out, setting it off in an unexpected time or place
customer_reviews.author: D. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter who attends college and has to be out by herself at times in the evening. Trusted that it would work. She had been carrying it around for several months. One day, her uncle decided to test and see what it actually sounds like and pulled the cord.....nothing..... no sound at all. So disappointed with this product but so glad nothing happened while she was carrying it around! I had researched several products and this one came with lot of great reviews. Not sure what happened with this one, but if you decide to order, make sure you test it before you trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Read

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy , very loud, very light in weight. Fashionable:)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help me feel safe when by myself or with my daughter. It is perfect. It is very very loud and will scare any animal or person away. It fits perfectly on my key chain as well. I was worried about it undoing on it's own but that is not the case. It is sturdy enough where it stays in place and easy enough to pull out and put back in. I feel safer already just having it on me. The price is unbelievable. Someone wanted $40.00 for one when I paid less then half of that for two! Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melika from NJ/NYC area

customer_reviews.title: LOUD
customer_reviews.text: This thing is LOUD. If a bad guy is trying to do some shady stuff, chances are he’s trying to be as discreet as possible about it. This will sure bring attention and possible witnesses your way. My only gripe is that i wish the pull string was at the bottom and not the side so that my Wife can hold her keys in one hand and just pull instead of having to hold the unit, with Keys dangling, and then pull sideways. Not too big of a deal but ease of us is important in a situation where you might not be thinking too clearly and nervous.
customer_reviews.author: A. A

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: Very loud and will definitely draw attention. My only complaint is that the pin is loose once it is pulled. My daughter was afraid that while trying to manage a backpack it would accidentally get pulled and she would not be able to find the pin. this would be horrible on a college campus. We ended up threading the loop from the pin onto the keychain so it would always remain attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter because I’m terrified she going to be kidnapped and sold into trafficking! It’s loud enough to startle but I don’t think it’s loud enough to scare. I’m moving on to pepper spray and a fog horn.
customer_reviews.author: G.W.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Got it quickly. The flashlight is bright and the alarm is quite loud. A bit worried that if the "key" comes out unintentionally and I can't find it, I will be left with a hugely loud, unstoppable alarm. Future editions might benefit from having the "key" permanently attached somehow so you don't accidentally lose it and can't turn off the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: K G.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as an example for a class that I teach on Personal Safety (Refuse To Be A Victim). As I was unpacking it and looking at it my wife picked it up and asked if she could test it. I said sure, just take it outside the first time. It is very, VERY loud and distinctive. It WILL get people's attention. Exactly as it is designed and intended to do. My wife and daughter, both, have put one on their key chain. I will let you know how they hold up and update this review in 90 days or so
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Compact size, loud, nice flashlight. Very pleased with product. Efficient delivery, good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Phlynn

customer_reviews.title: Very loud, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is much louder than expected. I'm a regular walker/jogger so this gives me extra piece of mind along with my pepper spray. I plan on putting this on a lanyard for easy access when walking. Love how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: marjax06

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! EXTREMELY LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Is this loud!!! Hands down this would be a huge deterrent no doubt! I like the little light as well. It’s not big a good size for a key ring although personally I find it a bit big just because I’m used to putting my keys around my neck on a lanyard or in my pocket. But I don’t think it could reasonably be smaller and be as loud. Not sure on durability yet since I just received but it seems very sturdy and durable. The pin is easy to pull and easy to replace back in the hole. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Breton

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere near 140 decibels, as measured with a DB meter a foot away.
customer_reviews.text: This advertising is bogus. Both alarms worked out of the box; that is, they make the typical loud annoying alarm squeal, as they should. It does scare the cat or dog in the same room. As a gift or protection device for self or family? Laughable. Military jet aircraft take-off from aircraft carrier with afterburner at 50 ft is 130 dB. Gas chain saw is 120 dB. My measured decibels on each a foot away in a quiet room are not even 100dB. And when you try to return it says "This item isn't eligible for return"! You have to call Amazon customer service to get a refund. Ridiculous. Don't be taken in as I was.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: They are the size of a key fob and I recommend you keeping it in a separate pocket in your ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these alarms before taking a trip overseas. I was going to be in a town where criminality is high and I though it could help in case I found myself in danger. We tried it at home. It is very loud and I'm sure it would attract a lot of attention if I had needed to use it. They are the size of a key fob and I recommend you keeping it in a separate pocket in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. It was a realtor gift. These are very loud and will definately draw attention if pulled. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: kozy

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my bag and it broken off from the ring in less than one month.
customer_reviews.author: OC NOVICE

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made and load sound. I bought for gals in my family to keep in purse or on a school backpack. A little more peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: ska

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for both my granddaughters to carry with them walking to and from the school bus. The alarm is very loud and very easy to use, even for a children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely loud. One died after two months of no use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these since one I received from a friend when I first had got my puppy and it died last year. Bought these over the summer and obviously I thought two would be a better buy because if one dies or gets lost, or maybe if somebody was walking with me and needed one as well. Unfortunately just three months down the road one of these stopped working. The light still works but the alarm doesn't. Never dropped it, only used to test it out once. Again, all things considered these are nice because they're loud and may just be handy at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Sakura

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: it hurt my ears. My husband complained when I opened it and told me I waisted my money. All until he heard it go off. Then he said, "Thats a good buy!". Lol I sent some to my sister & mother.
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month of having it. I haven't even used it once!
customer_reviews.author: Emkay

customer_reviews.title: Blasting Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the need to use this alarm. But it'll surely disorient any possible assailant and make people around you aware of any dangerous situation. The small size of this device allows you to carry it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That’s still up to you but a cry for help is always a good back up
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t overpowering- they’re about as loud as a car alarm is. Enough to attract attention. Will they save your life? No. That’s still up to you but a cry for help is always a good back up. I have one to my friend because she’s a nurse and walks across a dark parking lot after work. A girl can never be too careful. I have one on my keychain for when I’m alone with my children. It makes me feel slightly better. You pull the notch out and the alarm goes off. Replace it and it will stop.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: A couple of people had told me about carrying something like this for protection. And I finally decided to get one. I looked at a couple to compare and decided to get this one. One for mom and I. Due to this pandemic I no longer walk my pups alone but I normally do, haven’t but I normally go to the gym or run errands alone. And with all the crazy stuff that happen to us women it’s better to be safe then sorry. Love that it’s small enough. Easy to use. And loud enough to be heard. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: gmendez93

customer_reviews.title: Good in an emergency
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts for my staff who walk by themselves in big cities. The day that I gave one of these to a friend, she attended a mosque memorial for shooting victims. Unfortunately, someone called in a false active shooter alert. My friend hid with others, and this device (which she didn’t need to use) gave her comfort as she thought about how it would either distract a shooter or help others find and rescue them in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Haven't had to use it in an emergency situation yet but I think it will be a good tool to have. We are considering getting one for our daughter's backpack for emergencies. These seem well put together, sleek looking and sturdy. Alarm is very loud and increases in volume the longer the pin is pulled. I have it on my keys and it gives me a sense off security having something.
customer_reviews.author: CKLY

customer_reviews.title: For College Girls
customer_reviews.text: These alarms were just the ticket to give a group of six college girls going away for the first time. They were all enthused and gleefully attached them to their key chains. They feel safer now. The quality was good, and the sound was loud! One girl reported that she discretely tried hers out at 11:00 pm, and it woke the whole family! The service was quick, and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty, and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to carry with me when I'm doing yard work or going for a walk since we live on 20 acres of forest land with lots of wild animals lurking. We have a 2 acre clearing in the middle, but in addition to the ever present deer, there are the occasional sightings of bears, bobcats, coyotes, and even the occasional cougar. I would use this alarm if I see any of those animals to, hopefully, get them to run away. Since there are 2 of these alarms in this purchase, I gave one of them to my granddaughter to carry around on college campus when she walks back to her dorm after dark.
customer_reviews.author: FJLTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Don't work!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this item. Bought for both my adult daughters, had for less then 3 months. My 19 year old accidentally pulled pin out and you can barely hear siren, however flashlight works. My 28 year old tried hers today to see if hers worked as she goes to work in early a.m. when dark and the same. Sad if they would have needed them. Poor product. When I asked Amazon if they'd replace, answer was no....gave me $4 credit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ITS VERY, VERY, VERY LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something like this for 2 reasons. One, when I go out, and there are shady looking characters hanging around, for safety. Its great for that. But I mostly just carry a wallet that holds cards, bills, and coins. Its not good for that. I also thought that it would sound if I fell , it does not. Read the description carefully, and buy the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Partain

customer_reviews.title: Feel safer carrying this
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had to use these, thankfully, but I feel safer carrying one. They include an alarm as well as a small LED flashlight & easily fit in a pocket or bag. To activate the alarm, you simply pull the pin; the sound is pretty loud & would definitely attract attention. I bought these hoping they would be allowed through airport security (since pepper spray is prohibited) and indeed they are permitted.
customer_reviews.author: LaFleur

customer_reviews.title: Good personal security device
customer_reviews.text: I often walk in the dark. Having this device makes me feel safer. It is lightweight and easily attaches to a purse. It has a flashlight and sounds a loud alarm, when the pin is pulled, which is sure to draw attention. I would recommend this device to anyone who travels alone even if it is just to a shopping center or to and from work and could become a target of an attacker.
customer_reviews.author: Carol T.

customer_reviews.title: hope i never have to use it
customer_reviews.text: tested it and it works. its loud. like i felt like my ears were bleeding kinda loud. will it work in a "im being attacked" situation, probably but there is no way to tell until it happens. its small, lightweight and, again, loud. great deal at the 2 fer price. will probably gift a few to fellow runners this holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Alarm failed.
customer_reviews.text: The alarm failed to make any sound when the rip cord was pulled, twice. I gave the second personal alarm to a friend and didn’t test it. This failure to work is doubly unfortunate due to the nature of this item , namely personal security. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I recently traveled to London alone for a conference. I knew I would be walking around alone and wanted some added security. This made me feel so much safer. The alarm is LOUD! I kept it in my hand whenever I was walking alone and accidentally set it off at one point (my fault, I had forgotten to get it out of my bag before I went outside and in trying to get it out pulled the pin out accidentally). Even in the early evening fog, it was quite loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amberly

customer_reviews.title: Ear Splitting!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely ear-splitting alarm when you pull the pin! I have not had a chance to use it in an emergency and I hope I never have the need to. But if I do, it will definitely make a lot of noise. It does warn on the directions not to expose yourself too it for more than a very brief amount of time as it WILL damage your hearing. So it is definitely not something you want to use unless you must.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Neddderman-Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Very loud.  Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We hunt fluorescent rocks at night and go to some pretty out of the way places. It gets a bit scary at times. I feel much safer with this pinned to my coat. Pretty sure it would scare a wolf or a cougar. I hope. haha Drawback, the cord hanging down. And it pulls completely out instead of partway and then you can push it back in. In taking my backpack on and off it has gotten pulled out. And then I had to find it. It was LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I got these and they were so light plastic it felt like nothing was there. I tried to pull the thing out of the top to see how it feels and it wouldn't even work. I didn't put batteries in, but the piece that you pull out that is supp;osed to sound the alarm was like junk. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a little something that made noise to carry with me & WOW, so surprised when we pulled the pin to test this one. They are not kidding when best sound for the size. We went out on our deck to test it & the poor squirrels fell off the top of the fence almost, so gave them extra peanuts. Great design & perfect for the pocket. My friend loves purple so she got that one & I have the gold one. Great personal alarm!
customer_reviews.author: Sue B.

customer_reviews.title: Horrid!
customer_reviews.text: I was attaching this alarm to my purse and accidentally lightly touched the alarm which set it off and it would not turn OFF. I broke the cheap metal clasp trying to get it back into position. Luckily the screwdriver needed to remove batteries was nearby. My head is spinning from the sound. It was more painful than loud. Seriously this alarm is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Purple one was broken
customer_reviews.text: One of the devices simply did not work. The flashlight worked fine but the alarm did not go off. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Xu

customer_reviews.title: Great gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughters, aged 18 and 20. Both are in college and work late nights. They clipped on easily to their key rings and were loud enough to be heard several blocks away. The flashlight was an added bonus! I feel better knowing they have the alarms on them at all times. The only drawback is my 2 1/2 year old great grandson who wants to pull the ring out to hear the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My sis tell me her company move to a new ...
customer_reviews.text: My sis tell me her company move to a new building and the new parking lot have very limited light at night. And she has to walk alone about 10mintus. I immediately think we need one of these! I bought it one for me and one for her! I think everyoen should get one! We test it in the car, put out the pin( the grey tag), it sound so loud that people on street can hear it.It also have built in light, but the big circle is not the button for the light, the small button is,not sue why?!
customer_reviews.author: louis

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and powerful to be so small!
customer_reviews.text: These little alarms make a BIG sound! I got them as gifts and the gift holder told me how loud it was when she tried it in her apartment. I wasn't able to give the other one away so I kept it for myself. One day, while in my car, my the purse caught ahold of the pin and the sound went off and it scared me. I frantically searched for the pin so I could get it back on the alarm, hoping that people wouldn't think that I'd broken into my car! Very loud and powerful! A keeper!
customer_reviews.author: RrrV

customer_reviews.title: Love it, and it gives me a peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I've had these little devices for 3 months, and they both work just as great as the first day. The alarm is so much louder than I expected (scared myself testing this out), and the flashlight is so convenient. So lightweight, and the colors are gorgeous. I keep one in my car, and gave the other one to my mom. Highly recommend this !
customer_reviews.author: mystic_c

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the self defense arsenal
customer_reviews.text: The best part about this product was watching my nosey husband pull the pin and get the daylights scared out of him, 10/10 would buy again. But seriously, incredibly loud, hope it lasts, I will update this review if it doesn't. I also carry pepper spray and a knife in case the warning isn't enough, I suggest others do the same, especially if you live in a high crime area.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Buy without hesitation...
customer_reviews.text: These things are so loud that they hurt my eardrums! I'm going deaf (in both ears) and I still couldn't take the piercing sound for longer than a few seconds! Just pull the wrist cord out of the socket and I'm sure you will scare everyone away. If you can put it close to your attackers ears, I'm sure they will get disoriented enough that you may be able to escape or alert others to help you more quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Celie

customer_reviews.title: so loud
customer_reviews.text: i just bought this product as i travel often and get nervous sometimes when i'm wandering in new cities alone. however this thing is sooo piercing loud when i tested it at home i scared the crap out of myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Alfieri

customer_reviews.title: They work!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog got hold of the one I ordered for my daughter while I was working in the garage... she somehow managed to pull the pin. I was outside & heard the alarming sound, it was a little different sound than the smoke detectors but similar - I knew something was very wrong. Once I got inside, I gotta say NO ONE would want to be anywhere near this thing for very long. It would (IMHO) definitely scare off someone who was unaware of someone carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: Herieca

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I feel more confident with this devise and ordered one for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: pam burwell

customer_reviews.title: Don't rely on this ... Not dependable
customer_reviews.text: I tested the item for about a half second to be sure it worked. A month later, I took it on a hike. The pin was accidentally pulled and no sound ever emitted from it. I was upset, because as a lone hiker, I wanted something reliable. I came home, tested the other device, and it doesn't work either. Very disappointed. If you need a personal alarm that you can depend on, you're probably better off in investing in something of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Lapaglia

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! Extreme piercing sound, will scare away anybody/anything within 30 feet or more. Keep one end attached to purse or belt loop, the landyard in hand to pull and release pin if needed. Replace pin to stop the noise but...warning...this product is as deafening as it says...even testing you will only stand a couple of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chittum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry & loud
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use this yet. Reason I bought this was to have a loud noise if I needed to scare away coyotes. I walk a small dog and there have been coyotes report in this area. I tried it and it seems loud enough. It is very convenient to carry. You just pull the little cord and sound goes off. Push cord back in and it goes off. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely get attention.....
customer_reviews.text: I never guessed I would actually use this to quiet an anti-Trump aggressor. I was wearing my pink MAGA hat and minding my own business while shopping and a very aggressive woman approached me and started screaming obscenities at me about my support of the President and what she decided my hat meant. I simply pulled the alarm out of one of my purse pockets; and because I had the strap part attached to the purse, it was immediately activated and sounded a VERY VERY loud alarm. It certainly stifled any further opinion she might have and stopped the whole confrontation.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little alarms
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter (she is 18) to put on her purse. I also bought a set for myself. We tested one and it is LOUD! I believe it would scare someone off quickly. I wish it had a clip instead of just a ring - had to buy something for it to clip to purse but that was a minor detail. These are definitely worth the money; lightweight and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerdoci

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The alarm stops working after sometime,its really loud when it does work. In an emergency your would be better off screaming
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth buying for ur bishes..
customer_reviews.text: if u have bishes........buy them this.......its handy and if some dweeb tries to attach ur bishes....the sound this off and the dude should take off ..only reason he or she the dirty dweeb wouldnt take off is if ur bishesss is deep in the woods and no one is around....but anything noisey is worth having at this price........GET a bunch and give them out to all ur bisheessss
customer_reviews.author: Adrian S.

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have it attached to my keys and the strap on my wrist. The flashlight is amazingly bright. Great for finding keyholes, lighting the walkway etc. When the alarm is activated it is shriller than my smoke alarm. It attracts attention on noisy streets. Just plug the alarm activator to turn it off. It feels really cheap and I worry that it'll get smashed in my purse, accidentally sat on, or stepped on. It's very cheap plastic but great for small anytime gifts.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: It's really loud! A great deterrent!
customer_reviews.text: It's loud!!! That's what I wanted!!! So 5 stars for that. The only suggestion and the reason I gave overall 4 stars is because of the clip you pull out to sound the alarm could get lost since it's not connected to the device. I looped it around the key chain ring so it stays connected. Another thing, if there was some way to make sure it doesn't accidentallygo off in a purse or bookbag like when my daughter is in class (!!!) that would be great. Like a little clip that locks the clip in. Something that snaps the clip in I guess. It's great though!! Super loud!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t drop it!
customer_reviews.text: I think it worked well but I dropped one of them and panicked as I could not switch it off. Must have hurt it during the fall. I like it just be careful not to drop it. I had to pull the wires Very loud Probably would scare someone away. Just wish I had the one I broke back. I still have one.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen J Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I was looking for--
customer_reviews.text: I walk and run very early morning and it is usually dark so having this alarm gives me added security besides my cell phone. It is light and easily fits in a pocket and in the palm of my hand. I tried the alarm---very loud. I am going to get more of these--one for a friend and one for my granddaughter attending college.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie A. James

customer_reviews.title: Product works and is loud
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use this yet but I wanted it for safety as I live in the city and walk alone between work, home and bars when out. I tested both to make sure they worked and it is super loud. This should be effective if I should ever need to use it and deter anyone from trying to do anything. I recommend this personal safety alarm for anyone who feel they should ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Came used and damaged, but still works well
customer_reviews.text: It certainly does what it's supposed to the alarm is loud for sure. My issue is that they came to me used with the packaging amiss and dirty smudges on the gold one, when I purchased brand new. Also the metal loop that atatches the key chain to the device is pulled out and very loose, ready to fall off. The LED light on it is awesome though and on the upside I'll probably carry in my pocket and not from the keychain.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: I have one + gave the other to my niece. My brother who is a drill Sargent doesn’t like us going out with all the crazy things happening around us but this item has helped alíviate his concern. It’s super loud, but also I carry pepper spray. connect this to your purse or keys
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a review, really, since I haven't needed to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I received the two personal alarms in the mail. They are fairly loud and hopefully will be effective if ever I need to pull out the sound button. The alarms were delivered intact and fairly quickly. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: gayle a.

customer_reviews.title: GET YOURS NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have !!! It’s so loud and this morning I was riding my bike and was chased by an angry dog I almost forgot I had this in my hand and pulled it and it scared the dog away!!! It could have ended very ugly for me!!! Will definitely be purchasing more for my family!!! THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the need to use this yet, but quality is nice and getting two is a bonus. I gave one to my daughter. Came quickly and packaged well. Only thing that scares me a little is the long cord to the “pin”. I’m afraid it will get caught on something and accidentally go off. Would most likely scare anyone in sight. Especially me! But great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: FormicaBuckles

customer_reviews.title: Test it ever so often.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits in all the places I need it to fit. The only reason it lost a star is because sometimes it conks out, I’m guessing because of limited usage. I test it almost every week to make sure it is working. There were 2 times I had to furiously knock it or press down on the button to “wake it up”. I sure hope it’s awake when I actually need it!
customer_reviews.author: Francillia

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Although others had mentioned that these alarms did not hold their sound, I thought I'd give them a try anyway. When I first received the alarms, I tested them and was very impressed with the extremely loud sound. Unfortunately, less than a week later when I needed it to frighten a bear in our yard, the sound was weak and nowhere near as loud.
customer_reviews.author: KWM

customer_reviews.title: Very very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very light and cheap feeling product. However, it’s extremely loud and the light on it is pretty bright. Well worth the money. If you need something heavy duty, this is not for you. If you’re looking for one that’s affordable and lightweight, for walks/jogging, to use on campus, to keep in a purse, or to annoy your boyfriend with, then it’s a good fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Loves curls

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Since there’s been so many purse snatching in Hawaii lately, I decided to buy an alarm type of thing for my mom. I believe this was the best bang for your buck, two of these alarms for a good price. I told my bf not to pull the tab on the side...yes he still pulled it, yes it’s super loud. The only thing is it’s kind of hard putting it back into the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it will work if needed!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my granndchildren to put on their backpacks. They've had no need to use them so it's hard to review. It gave the opportunity to discuss "stranger danger" so if for nothing else it was good. Don't know if it can be used more than once.
customer_reviews.author: blueberrylady

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but not practical for using it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea, but when in a situation where you have to use it quickly, it just wouldn't work. It is not easy to get to hanging on your purse or being in your pocket, so if you can't use it when there is an emergency, it's of no value.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Too Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The noise is great, it is very easy to use, just pull on the string. The problem is that if you are taking it out of your purse, or you are searching around for something the sting can come loose on accident. You need to find something that is not too easy to set.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Noisy little thing! Might come in handy. Hope not.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit more cautious these days since one of the tenants where I live has been stalking me. He shows up whenever I'm walking my dogs on the premises or when I go to the mailbox or coming and going. Very creepy. Anyway, I've been arming myself, I already have a stun gun and now I have this noisy little deterrent. Pretty loud, I just wish it was as loud as the fire alarms in my place.
customer_reviews.author: Princess yaya

customer_reviews.title: These puppies are loud!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put one on my messenger bag. Don't want to be fumbling with stuff in pockets when this is needed. The pull pin that keeps it turned off got snagged one day and it went off. It's really loud. Can also be set up to detect tampering.
customer_reviews.author: TheMatrix

customer_reviews.title: Super loud!
customer_reviews.text: Got these today. Pulled the pin to test and HOLY CRAP it was loud. Also found the light to be very bright as well. People will definitely hear this if you're in a scary situation. Colors are quite nice as well and design isn't obvious. An extra layer of security for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime K.

customer_reviews.title: Loud personal alarm
customer_reviews.text: The alarm is loud, easy to use, attractive. The only problem is if I’m walking my dog, and I need to use it, it would probably hurt my dogs ears. On the other hand, if there’s threats from a coyote, I think this alarm would make the coyote run away.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Nordgren

customer_reviews.title: Defective! Unreliable! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk! One never worked, the other worked once when we tested it...but never again. Given the nature of the product and the absolute necessity that they function properly in an emergency situation, they should be NO longer sold on Amazon (or anywhere!). This product is a danger to anyone relying on it to aid them in a crisis. I would have given it ZERO stars if that were an option. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: nejiestar

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had to use. But so far so good. I feel safe just having it on my keychain. Just be careful, though, the pin doesn’t get caught on anything in your bag or purse that it would inadvertently come out and trigger the alarm. Something I always kind of think about.
customer_reviews.author: Eleonor C.

customer_reviews.title: Extra safety
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are so easy to use and make an awfully loud piercing noise... test it outside! We bought more so each of the grandkids could have one. I think it would be more effective than the pepper spray I also carry. Can't comment on the durability since we got them about a month ago and haven't had to actually use them yet. But they seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: ASF

customer_reviews.title: LOUD !
customer_reviews.text: Product as discribed by seller. VERY LOUD ! Plenty loud enough to attract attention of others for help in an uncomfrotable or scary situation. Adds one more bit of security for a couple of gals traveling together.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great xtra protection
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as safety precaution for my daughter who was going to be taking the Columbus city bus for the first time to her first college classes on OSU campus. We purchased these & another alarm that came with a pepper spray & this was the cuter of the options, the easiest to operate in a hurry & the loudest. We gave the other alarm to grandma & she & I share these two.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: In the package of two, I tried the light first. In the first one the light barely flickered on so I pulled the pin and nothing happened. The second on was a little more hopeful. The light was bright but when I tested it, it only made a sick bird sound. I'm extremely disappointed. I also bought a two pack for my friend in another state. Hers too had issues. Only one worked and only made a chirping noise. Do not buy this product. It is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Okay!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, that's all I'll say. Not quality. The chain is very flimsy. I see it not lasting very long.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Somehow the pin became disengaged in my purse and blared. Yes, it is VERY loud. I also inadvertently pulled the pin when it was attached outside my purse. Both false alarms were nerve-wracking. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Extra Protection
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some kind of self protection just in case anything happens, you never know what you will be getting into these days. So I got these security alarms. They are really loud when I tried it at home, I am sure if anything happens, it will scare the attacker and attract other people's attention. I hope I will never need to use it, just for a peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn T

customer_reviews.title: NO ALARM ACTUALLY SOUNDED
customer_reviews.text: I had this on my key chain for 4 months... accidentally got the pull on a door handle and it came out, but no alarm sounded! Tried putting it back in and pulling it out a few times, definitely doesn't work. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

product_meta.title: Taiker Personal Alarm for Women 140DB Emergency Self-Defense Security Alarm Keychain with LED Light for Women Kids and Elders-2 Pack
feature_bullets: ［140DB Loud sound］:You can get 2 pack: Purple/Gold.This self-defense keychain alarm can make Loud sound to draw others attention even in a far distance(606.9 ft away), which can effectively scare attackers in danger and seek people around for help.
［LED Design］: This safety alarm keychain also has a LED light that can hel you in the dark. Suitable for night running, walking dog, traveling, hiking, camping and other outdoor activities.
［Portable Design］: The personal alarm has a portable size, can be attached on keychain, backpack, ladies bag,etc.It suit for students, elderly, children, women, night workers and so on.
［Easy to use］: The alarm will be activated when you pulled the contact pin out,and siren will sound continuously for 30 minutes unless unless pin is reinserted to device.

［Durable & High Quality］: The TAIKER Personal Alarm adopted environmental and durable ABS materials, resistance to fall.We stand by our personal alarm with our outstanding customer service, if you ever have a problem, just return it for a replacement.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,751 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
